company: Zhen Fu Consulting & Technology Company Limited
description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY

We are a Hong Kong business consulting company founded in 2018; focused on SME consulting and high-growth investments.

More information: https://zftechhk.com/

ABOUT THIS POSITION

We are looking for a fresh / recent graduate to take on a role of a Client-Facing Business Consultant. The ideal candidate will be able to guide clients through all procedures required to ensure their client's success. The Business Consultant will be responsible for furnishing clients with relevant information and resources, supervising the completion of documentation, and submitting data on behalf of individuals, as required.

To ensure success as a Business Consultant, you should exhibit diligence, particularly when offering professional advice to individuals / businesses, as well as completing and submitting requisite paperwork. You will not be given a target / quota to reach monthly but an outstanding Business Consultant shall maintain a healthy pipeline to ensure the company's progressive growth.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

Keeping up-to-date with alterations to laws and regulations.
Meeting with prospective and extant clients to gauge which services they require.
Providing clients with all pertinent documentation.
Assisting clients with the completion of paperwork, and ensuring that this is submitted on time.
Verifying the authenticity of paperwork and supporting documents.
Providing clients with appropriate solutions.
Preparing and providing agreements / invoices for your services.

SKILLS REQUIRED

Graduate in or pursuing a bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Finance, Economics, STEM, Journalism, Technology or related disciplines is preferred.
Ability adapt to ad hoc projects and take on multiple roles.
Excellent time management skills, ability to multitask and prioritize work.
Top-notch research, fact-checking, and writing abilities.
Outstanding verbal communication in Cantonese / English.
Basic Excel and PowerPoint skills are required.
Strict observance of all applicable deadlines.
Solution-oriented approach to fulfilling duties.
No previous work experience required

This position is an all-rounded supporting position that provides a good stepping stone to enter the biotech/diagnostics sector.

Client Details

Our client is a fast-growing start-up biotech company with a strong financial background. They have established a strong global position in the biotechnology field within a short period of time.

Description

Responsible for general administrative duties to support COVID testing projects
負責一般行政工作，支援公司新冠病毒檢測項目
Fulfil daily operational duties in required projects
輔助日常運營，確保項目順利進行
Handle customer enquiries
處理客人咨詢
Fulfil any ad hoc duties as required
按要求處理各雜務

Profile

Bachelor degree or Diploma holder
教育程度大專或以上
Fresh graduates welcomed
應届畢業生亦可考慮
Basic computational skills
基本電腦操作
Good verbal and communication skills in both Chinese and English
良好中英文書寫及語言能力
Good communication skills, customer-oriented and detail-minded
溝通能力強，顧客導向，細心辦事

Job Offer

A fair and competitive remuneration package will be offered to the suitable candidate.

To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Heart Kwok on +852 2848 9583.

職責 :負責日常行政，文件工作、文書處理如撰寫信件、開立報價單、發票及會議紀錄；協助接待及接聽查詢 (一年合約，表現良好期滿可獲續約)。準僱員需自願進行《性罪行定罪紀錄查核》。

Programme Details

To develop the trainees’ functional competence and to strengthen their professional skills, we will provide trainees with opportunities to gain all-round exposure, including cross-departmental attachment training, external training courses and on-the-job coaching, etc. You will be able to learn:

E-Commerce Marketplace
Business Workflow and Project Management
Practical knowledge in Digital Advertising
Professional Marketing Skills

Who We Hire

We are looking for high-caliber fresh graduates from reputable Hong Kong and overseas universities to join our Management Trainee Programme.

Bachelor degree holder or above in any disciplines with result of 2nd upper or above
Entrepreneurial drive and an ability to deliver sustained performance with strong commercial acumen
Possess pleasant and outgoing personalities with strong leadership ambition
Self-motivation with strong will to learn

Excellent communication and presentation skills in English and Chinese

Staff Benefits

Healthcare Program including In-patient, Out-patient and dental

Annual Leaves, Marriage Leaves, Compassionate Leaves, and Iron-man / Iron-lady Leaves
Long Services Award

Application
